reviewText: Pretty racy stuff for the 1970's D V D quality was very good. I bought this because i am doing research on Mary Beth Hughes
I really like the blue hour movie, and I will probably watch it again, what a wonderful movie. but the other two movies I didn't care much for them.

As a representative of early seventies soft porn this set is very good and left no desire to see more.  Although it was interesting to see the cars, clothes, hair styles of late 20's somethings that were less then perfect bodies of today's glossy porn world.

Of the three movies, The Blue Hour is the most polished and although the production review called it "avant-garde editing", it was more of an attempt like trying a new seasoning.  The main actress was a little old for the main lead.  Perfect image of mature actress playing an ingnue.

One Naked Night and Three In a Towel get progressively porn-i-er with Three In a Towel having full female nudity.  Overdubbed with a reading of Shakespeare, Three In a Towel has its amusement like being dressed in the wrong fashion for a fashion event.

Stream if possible.
